entries.title: Meet the 'Degen' Traders Fueling the Latest Meme-Stock Mania
entries.description: Short for ‘degenerates,’ their risky style of trading has come roaring back in recent weeks. ‘It’s still better than a lottery ticket.’

entries.title: The American Company Trying to Keep Ukraine's Nuclear Reactors Online
entries.description: Westinghouse is replacing Russian fuel and planning to help Kyiv build new reactors

entries.title: Exclusive: Inside the Radical Plan to Save the Arctic by Refreezing It
entries.description: Deep in the Arctic scientists are experimenting with refreezing techniques in a bid to solve one of mankind’s biggest challenges: stopping the melt of sea ice and saving the planet.

entries.title: What's News: World-Wide
What's News: Business & Finance
Pepper…and Salt
China Exports Grew at Faster Rate in May
entries.description: Chinese exports grew at a faster rate in May, thanks to resilient global demand, while import growth slowed.

entries.title: USD/SGD Consolidates Ahead of U.S. nonfarm Payrolls Report
entries.description: U.S. nonfarm payrolls figures in line with or close to expectations should keep the USD Index steady, Maybank analysts said in an FX Research & Strategy report.

entries.title: Right-wing nationalist parties look set to surge in elections across Europe, but the shock wave from the vote results will travel slowly because of divisions among the political forces.
entries.description: Right-wing nationalist parties look set to surge in elections across Europe, but the shock wave from the vote results will travel slowly because of divisions among the political forces.

entries.title: The U.S. government has delayed public disclosures of cyber incidents several times since new rules came into force last December, a senior DOJ official said.
entries.description: The U.S. government has delayed public disclosures of cyber incidents several times since new rules came into force last December, a senior DOJ official said.

entries.title: The NTSB cited poor communication between an air-traffic controller and Southwest pilots after a probe of a near accident at a Texas airport last year.
entries.description: The NTSB cited poor communication between an air-traffic controller and Southwest pilots after a probe of a near accident at a Texas airport last year.

entries.title: Hamas's leader in Gaza told Arab negotiators that he would accept a peace deal only if Israel commits to a permanent cease-fire.
entries.description: Hamas’s leader in Gaza told Arab negotiators that he would accept a peace deal only if Israel commits to a permanent cease-fire.

entries.title: Hallie Biden, sister-in-law of Hunter Biden, testified Thursday in his trial on gun charges, describing his past addiction in detail.
entries.description: Hallie Biden, sister-in-law of Hunter Biden, testified Thursday in his trial on gun charges, describing his past addiction in detail.

entries.title: Russia arrested a French employee of a peace-building organization on an allegation of gathering information about its armed forces.
entries.description: Russia arrested a French employee of a peace-building organization on an allegation of gathering information about its armed forces.

entries.title: A federal judge ordered Steve Bannon to surrender by July 1 to serve a four-month prison sentence for defying the House committee that investigated the Jan. 6, 2021, Capitol attack.
entries.description: A federal judge ordered Steve Bannon to surrender by July 1 to serve a four-month prison sentence for defying the House committee that investigated the Jan. 6, 2021, Capitol attack.

entries.title: The S&P 500 slipped from its latest record Thursday, dropping less than 0.1%. The Dow added 0.2% and the Nasdaq fell 0.1%.
entries.description: The S&P 500 slipped from its latest record Thursday, dropping less than 0.1%. The Dow added 0.2% and the Nasdaq fell 0.1%.

entries.title: Meta is planning to allow businesses to use free AI chatbots on WhatsApp, a test of the company's approach to the technology.
entries.description: Meta is planning to allow businesses to use free AI chatbots on WhatsApp, a test of the company’s approach to the technology.

entries.title: The FTC is investigating whether Microsoft structured one of its latest deals with an artificial-intelligence startup to avoid a government antitrust review.
entries.description: The FTC is investigating whether Microsoft structured one of its latest deals with an artificial-intelligence startup to avoid a government antitrust review.

entries.title: The FDA rescinded its 2022 ban on Juul Labs's e-cigarettes, but the agency hasn't yet reached a final determination on whether they can stay on the U.S. market.
entries.description: The FDA rescinded its 2022 ban on Juul Labs’s e-cigarettes, but the agency hasn’t yet reached a final determination on whether they can stay on the U.S. market.
